amendment.description: To provide assistance for the OAS Special Mission in Haiti to implement OAS Resolution 822 to restore security and hold elections.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2003 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2003 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S13365-13366; text: CR S13365-13366) To provide assistance for the OAS Special Mission in Haiti to implement OAS Resolution 822 to restore security and hold elections.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2003 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2003 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dodd.
